name: Space Hop (Ishmhora)
description:
Harvest stuff to hop through the portal and roll the dice to decide your fate!!

WASD for movement

Select a tool and give it a shot on the different interactive items

Once the tool is equipped and the action started click on the item to harvest it

Once items have been harvested go click on the portal monitor to submit them and then try running through the portal.

(Apologies for the lighting and less refinement on the controller, I ran out of time)

On the Side:

Over the last 3 years I have participated in this game jam.  This jam and the GMTK youtube channel inspired me to learn game/software development and gave me solid goals to grow my skills.  I have used that journey to build a whole new career thanks to the inspiration spark that Mark Brown helped me nurture.  I have been able to watch my own skills grow year after year as I develop a game.  Thank you Mark Brown for sharing your love and thoughtful insights!  You know not what you do!
